channel.title: The best things about german servers
channel.description:
The best things about german servers
You can learn a different language You can easily translate text into a translator There are less people When drop parties ocur there arnt many people that go ( yet really good drops)
If you need a translator you may want to try out the one below, its free and easy to use
[url=http://dictionary.reference.com/translate/index.html]http://dictionary.reference.com/translate/index.html[/url]
Auf Wiedersehen (goodbye)

item.title: The best things about german servers
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

[quote=“Cruzer, post:27, topic:206011”][quote author=Zach 93 link=topic=271753.msg2260093#msg2260093 date=1212560551]
Lol, I remember going on a german server once. I was killing dragons on my range tank, and these level 100s thinkin they’re so badass came up and were all “jajajajajajajaa newb ranger, we slay u hard” “ja we do jajajajajajajaja” replied his friend. They wouldn’t shut the hell up, so I turned off my public chat.
[/quote]
Such a great story, tell me more.[/quote]
He was later on raped.

Read full topic
item.source: The best things about german servers

item.title: The best things about german servers
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

[quote=“ninja nub, post:3, topic:206011”]I love German servers! They have the biggest drop parties and there are barely any people. Now, I can say simple sentences in German from runescape. My irl friend speaks german so it’s pretty cool.

Bad thing: No pest control, No C wars, basically no minigame requiring people you can do.[/quote]
It’s possible to do that fishing mingame, as a single person (the trawler crap).

Read full topic
item.source: The best things about german servers

item.title: The best things about german servers
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:20, topic:206011”][quote author=I Br3ndan I link=topic=271753.msg2229789#msg2229789 date=1211075993]
Apparently, us Scots would find the German language easy to learn, since we both speak quickly and, more funnily, louder than others.
[/quote]
Wow I didn’t know you were a scot. Hehe.

Guys: douse those flames or I’ll be forced to lock this thread.

I would only use German servers if I were hosting a drop party. Otherwise the different language would be too much of an inconvenience to me.[/quote]

I don’t see how the other language would be an inconvenience. Unless you were doing quests.

Read full topic
item.source: The best things about german servers

@NewAgeMovement wrote:

Oh come on whats happening here? Am i the only one doesnt take this fucking forum so seriously? get a life
I WAS MAKING A STUPID FUCKING JOKE, OK?

Oh by the way , i didnt know it was influenced by the jamaican?!
Thought it was started somewhere in germany or england.
Anyway , a skinhead in the country i live in, are just some punks who are scared to be run over by the foreigners , so they join some bald bowlingheads group and start acting tough and shit. In other countrys i guess they actualy do have a purpose for being a skinhead.

item.title: The best things about german servers
item.dc:creator: @ninja_nub ninja nub
item.description:
@ninja_nub wrote:

Are you fucking retarded?

en.wikipedia.org

Skinhead

The skinhead subculture originated among working class youths in London, England in the 1960s and soon spread to other parts of the United Kingdom, with a second working class skinhead movement emerging worldwide in the 1980s. Motivated by social alienation and working class solidarity, skinheads (often shortened to “skins”) are defined by their close-cropped or shaven heads and working-class clothing such as Dr. Martens and steel toe work boots, braces, high rise and varying length straight-leg ...

Read full topic

I dont think those people are skinheads.
skinheads are people who got fucked in the ass by a black man and then want revenge.

item.description:

first of all, who told you i am American?If i make fun of a chinese person, then he would think bad things about MY country, so why would you care?

Second of all, you’re a fucking pussy, you’re a JEW and you dont have any problems with germany??I aint making fun of you being a jew, i’m just surprised you defend the Germans.

item.title: The best things about german servers
item.dc:creator: @ninja_nub ninja nub
item.description:
@ninja_nub wrote:

[quote=“NewAgeMovement, post:8, topic:206011”][quote author=ninja nub link=topic=271753.msg2229723#msg2229723 date=1211074149]

bitch nazis

Not all Germans are Nazis you fucking retard.
[/quote]
No way?? Are you serious?
I just think of nazis the moment i hear the word German. Sorry if you got offended nub.[/quote]

First of all, I’m Jewish. So I would, if anything, agree with you. But I don’t. The fact is, not all Germans are Nazis. Second of all, people who stereotype other countries make other countries look at them thinking that their country’s people are snobs. In other words, say you make fun of a Chinese person. He’ll think of Americans as mean, racist, fat people. But if you said something nice, then they would think of us as better people.
